resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158213</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158213</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2089</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">assignment 1:Genetic Counseling</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anweisung 1:Genetic Raten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">consultation de l'affectation 1:Genetic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">aconselhar da atribuição 1:Genetic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">consiglio di assegnazione 1:Genetic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παροχή συμβουλών ανάθεσης 1:Genetic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">asesoramiento de la asignación 1:Genetic</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is an online interactive assignment. The student is in a genetic counseling clinic, and plays the role of a genetic counselor. He diagnosis using a pedigree</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">genetic counseling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pedigree</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">inheritance.</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine interaktive Onlineanweisung. 
Der Kursteilnehmer ist in einer genetischen ratenen Klinik und 
spielt die Rolle eines genetischen Ratgebers. Er Diagnose mit 
einem Stammbaum</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une affectation interactive en ligne. 
L'étudiant est dans une clinique de consultation génétique, 
et joue le rôle d'un conseiller génétique. Il diagnostic en 
utilisant un pedigree</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma atribuição interativa em linha. 
O estudante está em uma clínica aconselhando genetic, e joga o
papel de um counselor genetic. Ele diagnóstico usando um 
pedigree</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un'assegnazione interattiva in linea. 
L'allievo è in una clinica di consiglio genetica e svolge il 
ruolo di un counselor genetico. Lui diagnosi usando un pedigree</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια σε απευθείας σύνδεση διαλογική 
ανάθεση. Ο σπουδαστής είναι σε μια γενετική κλινική 
παροχής συμβουλών, και διαδραματίζει το ρόλο ενός γενετικού 
συμβούλου. Αυτός διάγνωση που χρησιμοποιεί μια καταγωγή</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una asignación interactiva en línea. 
El estudiante está en una clínica de asesoramiento genética, 
y desempeña el papel de un consejero genético. Él diagnosis 
usando un pedigrí</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">genetisches Raten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zucht-</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erbschaft.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">consultation génétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">de pure race</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">transmission.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">aconselhar genetic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pedigree</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">inheritance.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">consiglio genetico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">di razza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">eredità.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γενετική παροχή συμβουλών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γενεαλογικός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κληρονομιά.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">asesoramiento genético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">pedigrí</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">herencia.</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <value>final</value>
          </status>

          <typicalAgeRange>
